AT.name: Shin Chan Vol. 3
AT.description: Altersfreigabe: Dieser Film ist für Kinder ab 12 Jahren geeignet. Diese Software ist nur auf Englisch verfügbar, Shin Chan is the nickname of the hero, Shinnosuke Nohara. He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Episode 7: Hey, Whitey Gets Drunk! Hey, We’re Going on a Picnic! Hey, This is the Friendship Relay! Episode 9: Shin chan Wars! Episode 11: Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 4) Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 5) Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 6) Episode 12: Hey, Mom and Dad Were Once Teenagers Too! Hey, Statues are Grateful! Episode 13: Hey, We’re the Three Little Pigs! 1 Hey, We’re the Three Little Pigs! 2 Going to a Piano Recital Episode 14: Hey, We’re Going to a Summer House! Hey, I’m Swapping Places With Mommy! Hey, I’m Swapping Places With Mommy! 2

He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! SI.name: Shin Chan Vol. 3
SI.description: Rating suitable for 12 years and over. Shin Chan is the nickname of the hero, Shinnosuke Nohara. He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Contains the following episodes: Episode 7: Hey, Whitey Gets Drunk! Hey, We’re Going on a Picnic! Hey, This is the Friendship Relay! Episode 9: Shin chan Wars! Episode 11: Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii!
